TopicTitle: KSP is choppy whenever Kerbin is in frame

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I recently installed Fedora after reading about 64 bit KSP running well on Linux. I tried launching a rocket, but found that even with relatively low graphics settings, the game is very choppy whenever Kerbin is visible within the frame. I'm very new to Linux so it's quite possible I'm using the wrong graphics drivers or some other obvious setting, any help you can offer would be splendid! My graphics card is an EVGA GeForce GT 740 4GB. Thank you in advance!
Hi jao, please see here for installing the non-free Nvidia drivers using RPMfusion on Fedora.

My god, it's full of stars...

That did the trick, KSP has never looked more beautiful! Thank you so much for taking the time to help!
